lead.p: replace â€” Replaces a string with a string based on a string or regular expression.

example.heading: replace example
example.code: console.log('Hello World'.replace('Hello', 'Foo')); // Foo World console.log('Hello World'.replace('o', 'a')); // Hella World console.log('Hello World'.replace(/o/g, 'a')); // Hella Warld
